src:
東京円２銭高、１ドル＝１０８円９５～９７銭

07 Nov 2019, 08:53

　７日の東京外国為替市場の円相場は、午後５時、前日（午後５時）比０２銭円高・ドル安の１ドル＝１０８円９５～９７銭で大方の取引を終えた。
　対ユーロでは、同０７銭円高・ユーロ安の１ユーロ＝１２０円６６～７０銭で大方の取引を終えた。
text:
Tokyo yen 2 yen high, 1 dollar = 108.95-97 yen

07 Nov 2019, 08:53

On the 7th, the yen exchange rate on the Tokyo foreign exchange market ended most of the transaction at 5:00 pm, 1 dollar = 108.95 to 97 yuan with a 02 yen appreciation / dollar depreciation compared to the previous day (5 pm).
In terms of the euro, most transactions were closed at 1 euro = 120 yen 66-70 yuan, with a 07 yen appreciation and a euro depreciation.
